title: Demacia Icon
body: Hmm having trouble unlocking the free Demacia Icon. Checked that I was logged in and that I was in the right region but I keep getting an error to refresh and try again.

replies.body:
No worries! This is probably a weird issue with your browser history. Let's try going through and clearing that history as well as your cookies to see if we can get you that icon. Check out this [**guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) we have and you should be on your way! 

Keep in mind that the icons will start going out on April 20th, and none of them have been given out yet.
Thank a lot. Clearing history and cookies actually worked for me.
Apparently I have the same issue. Does anyone know how to fix this?
"Keep in mind that the icons will start going out on April 20th, and none of them have been given out yet."
The demacia icon does not appear, I unlock it but I can not find it in the game, what do I do?
i have no issus, no work for me....clean, delete cache....no icon.{{champion:59}}
